page.title: 02Home Life
page.content: The {daily routine}of Paul,aged 11.6yrs. I get up at 7.30am and have cereals for breakfast.My mum comes down with our baby and feeds her.At about 8.30 my other sister comes in from the paper round and has her breakfast.I go and get dressed and at 8.30am I go to school.My dad works on shifts so the time he gets up can vary. School starts at 9am,it takes 5 minutes to walk there. If dad's working we have a snack for lunch.At 12.40pm I go back to school and usually have a game of football.School starts at 1.15pm and ends at 3.30pm .I arrive home at 3.40pm and watch 'Children's ITV' then at 5.15pm we have tea. At night I watch television.
